chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, punctual as ever, croaked, "Chirp! Chirp! Medicine time!" Henrietta the chick 🐥, glued to "Pecking Bad" on TV, waved him off. "Later, Ferdie!" ⏰ 10 PM turned into midnight. Henrietta woke up next morning covered in 🪶 bumps. "Forgot my anti-allergy meds! I’m allergic to…daylight saving time!" 😱 Ferdinand just shook his head. "Should've listened. Now you look like a dandelion!" 🌼
